item.title: Helldivers 2 Has a Massive Opportunity with the Meridian Singularity
item.description: The Meridia Singularity has been the biggest Helldivers 2 event to date. However, with the looming threat of the Meridia black hole is also a massive opportunity for Arrowhead Game Studio. Arrowhead has a few avenues they can take with the inevitable conclusion of the singularity.

item.title: Path Of Exile 2: Best Skills For The Huntress Class
item.description:
Summary

  • Path of Exile 2's beta impresses with innovative gameplay and graphics updates.
  • The Huntress class brings new skills like Disengage and Spear Field, enhancing gameplay.
  • Skills like Whirling Slash and Thunderous Leap offer effective crowd control and damage output.

Path of Exile 2 's beta is in full effect as the team at Grinding Gear Games continues to capture lightning in a bottle. Since releasing its paid open beta program, Path of Exile 2 has received monumental praise for its innovative overhaul of the first game. Graphically and gameplay-wise, Path of Exile 2 has elevated its core systems and made a challenging and fun game to play. The game receives frequent updates, implementing balance changes, new abilities, and even new classes for players to enjoy.

Just recently, Path of Exile 2 received its latest update, Dawn of the Hunt, which introduced the Huntress class into the game, along with a myriad of other ability gems. The Huntress comes in as a mix of melee and range style of play who wields a Spear and Shield. From raining down elemental javelins to inflicting debilitating status effects, the Huntress is the brand-new toy for players to get their hands on in Path of Exile 2, and here are the best skills for the class.

8 Disengage

A Great Mobility Tool With An Added Bonus

Disengage is an early skill that players will acquire while leveling Huntress in Path of Exile 2 . This skill comes with a strong utility to get players out of a dire situation while also combining with other skills like Whirling Slash. Upon activation, Disengage will cause the Huntress to backflip a significant distance, becoming immune to physical attacks and projectiles while also attacking with a spear flourish.

Disengage is an excellent option for escaping sticky situations when surrounded by a mob or standing in an enemy AOE ability. Additionally, Disengage can help trigger the effect of Whirling Slash and grant the Huntress a Frenzy Charge.

7 Whirling Slash

Great For Both Single Target And Mob Clear

Whirling Slash is another early game skill that players will most likely take all the way to the endgame in Path of Exile 2 . Upon cast, the Huntress twirls her spear, kicking up a whirlwind and damaging and blinding all enemies in the area of effect.

The damaging effect can be recast and enhanced by stacking the whirlwinds on top of one another. Specific elemental effects can also affect Whirling Slash, causing its damage to change. Upon the huntress exiting the area of the Whirlwind, it collapses and explodes, causing high damage to targets hit.

6 Spear Field

Strong Skill For Controlling Large Areas

Spear Field is a large area of effect skill that can allow Path of Exile 2 players to live out their dreams of becoming Vlad the Impaler. Upon cast, the Huntress stabs her spear into the ground and sends out a wave of penetrating spears that skewer enemies caught in their path.

Additionally, enemies that walk into and come in contact with the spears will cause them to explode and deal more damage. Spear Field can be cast multiple times to increase the number of spears and the area they affect. Pushing the skills limits even further, players who detonate the skills will instantly trigger the spear explosion damage, making it a great farming tool.

5 Explosive Spear

A Fun And Powerful Distance Skill

Explosive Spear is a ranged skill great for stacking damage at a distance, making it a fun and valuable skill for Huntress players. When activated, the Huntress throws a fast flying projectile that plants itself in the ground near its target or at the maximum distance of the skill when activated.

After a short delay, the spear will explode, dealing a wide area of damage to nearby targets. This skill is incredibly useful against projectile enemies that spit acid, teleport away, or have projectiles of their own.

4 Rake

A Bleeding Ability With Strong Synergies

Rake is another mobility skill with a lethal edge in Path of Exile 2. Players who want to take advantage of the bleeding effect in the game will enjoy adding this to their hotbar. When used, Rake causes the Huntress to leap forward a reasonable distance toward a targeted enemy and slash with her spear.

The blade deals moderate damage but inflicts bleeding on enemies. Bleed is one of the damage-over-time effects in Path of Exile 2 and can be made a powerful component in battle thanks to skill gems recently implemented in the game, such as Herald of Blood, which causes foes defeated by bleed to explode.

3 Storm Lance

Great AOE Skill With A Variety Of Uses

The Lightning Spear skill is another damaging ranged option for the Huntress that leaves enemies electrified and plants a radiating spear in the ground that radiates damage. When cast, similar to Exploding Spear, the Huntress hurls an electrified weapon through the air and, once it plants in the ground, lets out bolts of electricity to nearby enemies.

After a short duration, the spear will explode and charge the earth beneath the weapon, making volatile terrain for enemies. In addition, the spear can be detonated by other skills and enhance the damage dealt by the spear, including with the use of a frenzy charge.

2 Lightning Spear

A Strong, Ranged Option For Large Groups

Storm Spear is another ranged option for the Huntress and one of the best skills in her armory, turning her Spear into a contact projectile, similar to an arrow. Unlike the Exploding Lance and Storm Lance skills, Storm Spear makes contact with enemies and explodes on impact.

When cast, the Huntress hurls a spear in a straight line. Once it makes contact with an enemy, it explodes into sparks, damaging nearby enemies and charging them. With the right support gems and frenzy charge management, Storm Spear can clear a mom in no time flat.

1 Thunderous Leap

A Mobility Skill With A Powerful Impact

Thunderous Leap is a dream skill belonging to the Huntress class for fans of the spear weapon type or fans of the Fate Stay Night series. When the skill is used, the Huntress leaps into the air and slams down with a wide area of effect, planting her spear into the ground and heavily damaging all nearby enemies.

Thunderous Leap has amazing synergies with multiple support gems in Path of Exile 2 , such as Fist of War and elemental options to elevate the skill's damage. What makes Thunderous Leap shine is that it acts as a detonation skill, which can trigger many of the Huntress's skills' secondary effects.

8 Images

item.title: Honkai: Star Rail - All Nymph Locations in "Demigod Council" Dawncloud
item.description:
Collecting Nymphs in Honkai: Star Rail has been a side job for Trailblazers while searching for treasure chests. In almost every sub-area, there are 10 or more Nymphs to be collected and offered to the respective Garmentmakers in the area.

By doing so, players will obtain some rewards, notably Stellar Jades, for their hard work. After all, the Nymphs are pretty crafty with their hiding places, and some of them are hard to find without careful scrutiny. For those struggling, here's how to find all 10 Nymphs in "Demigod Council" Dawncloud .

"Demigod Council" Dawncloud Nymph Locations In Honkai: Star Rail

Trailblazers can find 10 Nymphs in "Demigod Council" Dawncloud of Honkai: Star Rail . While the map looks big, it is mostly one-way only, so players will not get lost as easily as they might in other maps. To unlock this sub-area, players need to complete the "Through the Petals in the Land of Repose" Trailblaze Mission.

All the Nymphs are quite chatty with the dialogue box above their body, so you can use that as a guide to spot their position.

  • 1. First, teleport to the Sacred Path of Dawncloud Space Anchor . Then, walk forward before heading west to the huge room. You can find the first Nymph above the fireplace.
  • 2. From the previous position, go to the opposite room and look at the mural on the wall. You can spot a pink butterfly perched in the middle of the art.
  • 3. Go back to the main road and walk to the north before the Janus' Passage . On the edge of the platform, you can find a Capfly acting as a captain.
  • 4. Teleport to Demigod Council Space Anchor and follow the path to the left. The Nymph in this area is stuck to a speeding Flying Amphora. Make sure your active character has a long-ranged attack so you can break the Flying Amphora when it gets near.
  • 5. Afterward, continue heading north to the end of the long road. The fifth Nymph in "Demigod Council" Dawncloud is on the last pillar to the right.
  • 6. Use the Titan Cliff: Entrance Space Anchor , and by the time you take the second set of stairs, look to the right to find a Nymph on a tree. Dodgerfly will flutter around the tree and play hide-and-seek with you. Even if you choose the wrong answer, you will still get to collect the Nymph.
  • 7. Use the elevator to reach the upper level and interact with the stone control platform to control the Hand of Zagreus . The seventh Nymph can be found northeast of the control platform's location, 'swimming' in the waterfall.
  • 8. From the previous spot, head southeast towards the broken rocks to find a Climbfly between the cracks.
  • 9. Next, float to the mural in the southeast for the Origamifly. Upon catching it, you will get a Dromas Steak and Credits.
  • 10. Disengage from the Hand of Zagreus and follow the path to reach the middle of the stairs for the last Nymph on top of the wind chimes.

Your comment has not been saved

item.title: Shadow Labyrinth Might Offer a Blueprint for Other Classic Video Game Revivals
item.description:
Some video game franchises are just too iconic to die. These video game franchises can go decades without new entries, but because of their groundbreaking debut and initial popularity, their star power has refused to fade. Pac-Man is one such franchise.

2025 will mark Pac-Man 's 45th birthday, with the beloved franchise first hitting arcade floors all the way back in May 1980. The last traditional, mainline Pac-Man release was 2016's Pac-Man Championship Edition 2 , and the nine years since then have seen a handful of multiplayer battle royale entries be released. But the Pac-Man franchise is about to rear its head once more, and this time it's unlike anything fans have seen before.

Shadow Labyrinth Could Pave a Way Forward for Dormant Video Game Franchises

How Shadow Labyrinth Is Putting a Fresh Spin on Pac-Man

Initially teased in the Secret Level episode "Circle," Shadow Labyrinth is an all-new take on the Pac-Man formula, and a radical departure from what came before it. In an attempt to expand the Pac-Man franchise's audience beyond its usual family-oriented market, Shadow Labyrinth is offering a much darker, more violent experience than fans would ever expect from one of gaming's oldest and brightest mascots.

Aesthetically, Shadow Labyrinth will be a dark and foreboding game, with plenty of ominous locations drenched in shadow and dim lighting. Shadow Labyrinth will also be a surprisingly gory game, with the ESRB giving it a T-rating for blood and fantasy violence.

Shadow Labyrinth 's gameplay will also be a dramatic departure from what fans have come to expect from Pac-Man , swapping out the traditional top-down maze-running gameplay for 2D hack-and-slash action. Even staple features of the series, like Pac-Man's ability to eat ghosts, have been flipped on their head, with the glowing orb "Puck" being able to consume dead monsters and transform the player into them temporarily.

Every element of Shadow Labyrinth looks to be a complete tonal juxtaposition of the identity that Pac-Man has established over the last four decades, but the game seems thoroughly committed to this unique vision. If Shadow Labyrinth manages to stick the landing, it could be the franchise's first standout entry in years.

Other Classic Video Game Franchises Should Follow in Shadow Labyrinth's Footsteps

If Shadow Labyrinth performs well, it could also end up paving the way for other classic video game revivals. There are a plethora of old video game franchises that are still fondly remembered but haven't had major releases in years or even decades. These franchises could make a bold return to the video game landscape by following in Shadow Labyrinth 's footsteps and delivering a gameplay experience that's unlike anything their respective series have tackled before.

The beloved 1979 Galaxian and its 1981 successor Galaga haven't enjoyed a fully-fledged new release since 2011's Galaga Legions DX . It's about time Galaga made a triumphant return, and it could do that with an experimental tonal shift, perhaps coming back as a gritty space flight simulator. Along similar lines, Space Invaders could come back as a brutal and bloody Helldivers -like defense game. Even Oregon Trail could embrace Shadow Labyrinth 's blueprint, offering fans a new post-apocalyptic version of the classic survival game.

item.title: Path of Exile 2: How to Get Essences
item.description:
Path of Exile 2 is one of the most notoriously complicated games out there, with hundreds of systems layered on top of each other and so much information packed into it that it is nearly impossible to digest it all, especially for new players.

One of the best examples of this is Essences, special materials that can be massively helpful when it comes to crafting endgame gear. However, since they are abhorrently expensive to obtain from the market, a lot of players ignore them completely. Here is how Essences work and how to get them.

How to Get Essences in PoE 2

Essences can be obtained in one of two ways:

  1. Essence trapped monsters in maps: Throughout the campaign and in the endgame, there will occasionally be monsters trapped in stone prisons. Some of these are Essence monsters that will drop a guaranteed Essence upon defeat. You can easily tell when you’ve encountered an Essence monster thanks to the context menu that pops up above their heads, detailing which Essence you will be able to get for defeating it.
  2. Currency Exchange: Essences can be bought through the Currency Exchange, which can be accessed by talking to Alva in the hideout.

Essence monsters can be found in the campaign and the endgame. However, they are relatively rare encounters, meaning players will not be able to amass a large number of Essences through regular gameplay.

The best way to farm for Essences is through the endgame unique map, Silent Cave , which houses multiple guaranteed Essence monsters as well as a boss that gets stronger the more Essence monsters you defeat. This allows players to take on as much risk as they can handle.

What Are Corrupted Essences in PoE 2

In addition to the regular Essences and Greater Essences, there are also four Corrupted Essences that can only be obtained by using a Vaal Orb on a Greater Essence monster (before freeing it). These offer unique ways to craft on gear, making them extremely valuable. They are:

  1. Essence of Hysteria: Upgrades a normal item to Magic with one Item Rarity modifier. Can only be used on Helmets, Rings or Amulets.
  2. Essence of Delirium: Upgrades a normal item to Magic or a Magic item to a Rare item with one random notable passive as a modifier. Can only be used on Body Armour.
  3. Essence of Insanity: Upgrades a normal item to Magic or a Magic item to a Rare item with one guaranteed property. Can only be used on Belts. On Corruption, Item gains two Enchantments.
  4. Essence of Horror: Upgrades a normal item to Magic or a Magic item to a Rare item with one guaranteed property. Can only be used on Gloves or Boots. 100% increased effect of Socketed Runes and Soul Cores

Corrupted Essence monsters have unique combat mechanics that make them even harder to defeat compared to regular Essence monsters.

How to Use Essences in PoE 2

Other than Corrupted Essences, which are unique cases, there are two tiers of Essences:

  1. Essence: Used to upgrade a Normal item to a Magic Item with a modifier with a specific tag.
  2. Greater Essence: Used to upgrade a Magic item to a Rare Item with a modifier with a specific tag.

Every modifier in Path of Exile 2 has a specific tag or multiple tags associated with it. The #% increased Movement Speed modifier, for example, is only found on Boots and has the tag Speed. Since this is the only Speed tag that can be put on Boots, it means that when you use the Speed Essence ( Essence of Haste ) on Normal Boots, it guarantees that it will roll the #% increased Movement Speed modifier and nothing else. This means if you want to get Boots with a movement speed roll on it, you can guarantee it via this Essence.

However, it’s not always this simple. If you’re aiming for a +#% to Lightning Resistance , for example, you want to use the Lightning Essence ( Essence of Electricity ), but when used on Normal Boot, there are two possibilities. Either it will roll a +#% to Lightning Resistance , or it will roll a #% reduced Shock duration on you , which is a modifier that also has the Lightning tag.

The best place to check the tags on a modifier, as well as all possible modifiers that any given item base can roll, is Craft of Exile. Simply search for the base you’re crafting here, and it will clearly show you all modifiers and their tags separated into prefixes and suffixes.

Greater Essences are used the exact same way as regular Essences, with the only difference being that they can convert Magic items into Rare items.
